page.title: 02Farming in the area.
page.content: Arable farming is predominant in this area but there is a little dairy farming.Most of our area is hilly and wooded and therefore unsuitable for farming. There are seven farms in the area and the farm houses themselves are very old which means that there has been farming in this area for many years. The fields are large and spacious at the bottom of the woods. The woods are plantations of coniferous trees leaving no room for farming although many trees are being cut down and being used for other forestry purposes including nature trails.
